description: Now for WebOS 3.0 TouchPad! Available in English.  DigiAccident is an application to record the details of a vehicle collision right after it happens. Getting the as much information as possible about the wreck is important especially later if the details are contested. DigiAccident uses your device’s GPS location to record the exact location of the collision including the Longitude, latitude, and street address. Keep in mind that the GPS may not be 100% accurate because it is dependent on signal strength from the GPS satellites. if the signal is not available then you can manually input the location. You can enter all the details of the accident including an unlimited number of vehicles, people, narratives, and images. This application does not provide legal advice and is simply a tool you can use to collect the information you will need for your insurance company.
